entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 10:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.4°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
